select
distinct
o.id id, order_id, up_order_id, phone, fee, disprice,zf_status, zf_msg, zf_order_id, zf_time,zf_callback_time,transaction_id,cz_status,cz_msg,cz_time,cz_callback_time, agent,o.create_time create_time,u.wx_name wx_name from wx_order o LEFT JOIN (select id,wx_name from wx_user) u ON o.user_id = u.id
order by ${orderByClause}
